sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SIRGOOJAH, a town and district of Hindustan, in the province of Gundwana, the latter situated about the 23d de- gree of north latitude. The town is situated about twelve miles from the northern frontier of Palamow. Long. 83.50. E. Lat. 23. 5. N.
